short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just an assistant for KartRider web-based games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports KKR (KartLeague emblem collecting event, Balloon shooting, Honey roulette, Yut Nori, Filp card, Gashapon machine, Bingo, Seesaw), TKR (Honey marble, Filp card), PK (Honey marble, Filp card) and future web games.
